SELECT sys_id, order_no, entity_no, user_cate, user_id, appointment_cates, related_no, appoint_date, time_from, time_to, address, status, institution_id, service_option, appraisal, is_cancelled, creation_time, create_by, edit_time, edit_by, FROM entity_healthy_appointment
AND sys_id LIKE CONCAT('%', #{params.sysId}, '%')

SELECT eha.sys_id, eha.order_no, se.entity_name, eha.user_cate, eha.user_id, ub_ur.full_name, ub_ur.user_gender, ub_ur.user_age, ub_ur.relative_id, ub_ur.relative_name, ub_ur.relative_gender, ub_ur.relative_age, ub_ur.remark FROM entity_healthy_appointment eha LEFT JOIN sys_entity se ON se.entity_id = eha.entity_no LEFT JOIN (SELECT ub.user_id, ub.full_name, TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, ub.date_of_birth, CURDATE()) AS user_age, ub.gender AS user_gender, ur.relative_id, ur.relative_name, TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, ur.date_of_birth, CURDATE()) AS relative_age, ur.gender AS relative_gender, ur.remark FROM user_basic ub LEFT JOIN user_relatives ur ON ur.user_id = ub.user_id )ub_ur ON ub_ur.user_id = eha.user_id where
eha.user_id=#{userId}

SELECT eha.sys_id, eha.order_no, eha.user_cate, eha.address, eha.time_from, eha.user_id, eha.service_option, ehpm.descr, ub.full_name, ub.gender AS user_gender, ub.id_card_no AS user_id_card_no, ub.cellphone_no AS user_cellphone_no, ur.relative_id, ur.relative_name, ur.gender AS relative_gender, ur.id_card_no AS relative_id_card_no, ur.cellphone_no AS relative_cellphone_no, uc.card_cates, uc.card_no FROM entity_healthy_appointment eha LEFT JOIN order_main om ON om.order_no = eha.order_no LEFT JOIN entity_purchse_main epm ON epm.order_no = eha.order_no LEFT JOIN entity_healthy_package_main ehpm ON ehpm.sys_id = eha.pkg_main_id LEFT JOIN user_cards uc ON uc.user_id = eha.user_id LEFT JOIN user_basic ub ON ub.user_id = eha.user_id LEFT JOIN user_relatives ur ON ur.relative_id = eha.user_id WHERE
eha.order_no=#{orderNo}
